description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooked Panang Beef Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow Cooked Panang Beef Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sachet Hart & Soul Panang Curry Recipe Base

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, pile rice into bowls, top with curry and serve the salad on the side or in the bowls. Serve with a wedge of lime.
